title: Danielle Van Dam // 47
description:
In early 2002, a 7-year-old girl is taken from her bedroom in the middle of the night. Her parents don't realize until the following day, but when they do, they phone police. The search begins in their neighborhood and detectives narrow in on the man who lives 2 doors down. This is the murder of Danielle Van Dam.

___________
